price: 6. У кечани кундузга киритур ва кундузни кечага киритур. У диллардаги сирларни билгувчидир.
arabic: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wahuwa ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
translations: of what is in the breasts
of what is in the breasts
